text: The Southern Way is the debut EP by UGK, which was released on cassette only in 1992. Side A is dubbed "Short Side" and Side B is dubbed "Texas Side". ==Track listing== Short Side #"Cocaine in the Back of the Ride" (5:11) #"Short Texas" (7:41) #"Tell Me Something Good" (6:50) Texas Side #"Trill Ass Nigga" (5:06) #"976-BUN-B" (3:27) #"Use Me Up" (4:34) #"Tell Me Something Good" (6:54) [Radio Mix] Category:UGK albums Category:1992 debut EPs Category:Gangsta rap EPs
title: The Southern Way
